text: Brewster's Millions is a 1914 American comedy movie directed by Cecil B. DeMille and Oscar Apfel and is the first adaption of the 1902 novel of the same name by George Barr McCutcheon and the 1906 play of the same name. It stars Edward Abeles, Joseph Singleton, Sydney Deane, Dick La Reno, Monroe Salisbury and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It is a lost movie. ==Other websites== * Category:1914 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Oscar Apfel Category:Movies directed by Cecil B. DeMille Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Brewster's Millions (1914 movie)
